titles.title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to clarify the authority of the Secretary of the Treasury to rescind identifying numbers of tax return preparers.
To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to clarify the authority of the Secretary of the Treasury to rescind identifying numbers of tax return preparers.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: This bill authorizes the Department of the Treasury to rescind the identifying numbers of tax return preparers for incompetence or disreputable behavior.
